answer:
QUESTION

Can we have intercourse after confirmation of pregnancy coz i have heard from some ppl that intercourse is not aloowed for the first 4 month of pregnancy as well as When should we stop intercourse in pregancy ?

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful

Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

Intercourse during pregnancy is based on the wellbeing of the wife and child. Therefore, if it will cause harm to the wife or child then one should refrain from intercourse during pregnancy. The gynaecologist will be able to advise on that.

الفتاوى المحمودية 18/633 جامعة فاروقية

And Allah knows best
